Message:
Ominous bubbles surrounded
the nearby buildings,
swallowing all they latched on to.

It was only a matter of time
before we would also be...

Just then, I heard another
cry for help outside the gate.

At a time like this,
it shouldn’t matter if
they’re human or witch...
But...!

“Why did this have to happen
while Leader Lucille’s away?!
What should we do...?”

I overheard those words
suddenly slip from another witch.

That’s right...
Up until now, we’ve always
relied on Leader Lucille to
decide everything for us.

I-I have to be the one
to make a choice...
since Leader Lucille
left me in charge...

But, if I were to make
the wrong choice,
and put everyone in danger...
